org.modelio.gproject.gproject

Class GProjectFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.gproject.gproject.GProjectFactory

  • public class GProjectFactory
extends Object
    Factory that instantiates a GProject from a File path.

    • Method Detail

      • openProject

        @Deprecated
public static GProject openProject(ProjectDescriptor projectDescriptor,
                                               IAuthData authData,
                                               IModuleCatalog moduleCatalog,
                                               IModelioProgress monitor)
                                        throws IOException
        Deprecated. use openProject(ProjectDescriptor, IAuthData, IModuleCatalog, IProjectMonitor, IModelioProgress) that takes a IProjectMonitor.
        Create a GProject from a project descriptor.
        Parameters:
        projectDescriptor - the project descriptor
        authData - authentication data. If not null this data will override the authentication descriptor.
        moduleCatalog - the modules catalog
        monitor - a progress monitor
        Returns:
        the built GProject.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the project configuration cannot be read.

      • getRemoteDescriptor

        public static ProjectDescriptor getRemoteDescriptor(ProjectDescriptor projectDescriptor,
                                                    IAuthData authData,
                                                    IModelioProgress monitor)
                                             throws IOException,
                                                    GProjectAuthenticationException
        Get the remote project descriptor for a project descriptor.
        Parameters:
        projectDescriptor - a project descriptor.
        authData - authentication data.
        monitor - the progress monitor to use for reporting progress to the user. It is the caller's responsibility to call done() on the given monitor. Accepts null, indicating that no progress should be reported and that the operation cannot be cancelled.
        Returns:
        the remote project descriptor.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of failure
        GProjectAuthenticationException - in case of authentication failure.

      • isProjectSpace

        public static boolean isProjectSpace(Path projectPath)
        Tells whether the given path is a project space path.
        Parameters:
        projectPath - a directory path
        Returns:
        true if it is a project space path, else false.

      • registerFactory

        public static void registerFactory(IProjectFactory f)
        Register a project factory.
        Parameters:
        f - a project factory.

      • readDescriptor

        @Deprecated
public static ProjectDescriptor readDescriptor(Path confFile)
                                                    throws IOException
        Deprecated. Use readProjectDirectory(Path).
        Create a ProjectDescriptor from a "project.conf" file.
        Parameters:
        confFile - the project configuration file.
        Returns:
        the read project descriptor.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of error reading the configuration file.

      • readProjectDirectory

        public static ProjectDescriptor readProjectDirectory(Path projectDir)
                                              throws IOException
        Create a ProjectDescriptor from a project directory.
        Parameters:
        projectDir - the project directory.
        Returns:
        the read project descriptor.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of error reading the configuration file.

      • openProject

        public static GProject openProject(ProjectDescriptor projectDescriptor,
                                   IAuthData authData,
                                   IModuleCatalog moduleCatalog,
                                   IProjectMonitor eventListener,
                                   IModelioProgress monitor)
                            throws IOException
        Create a GProject from a project descriptor.
        Parameters:
        projectDescriptor - the project descriptor
        authData - authentication data. If not null this data will override the authentication descriptor.
        moduleCatalog - the modules catalog
        eventListener - a project monitor to add immediately on project creation.
        This monitor will receive events fired while opening the project. The monitor will remain once the project is open. If it is not your intended behavior you have to remove it manually after this call returns.
        monitor - the progress monitor to use for reporting progress to the user. It is the caller's responsibility to call IModelioProgress.done() on the given monitor. Accepts null, indicating that no progress should be reported and that the operation cannot be cancelled.
        Returns:
        the built GProject.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the project configuration cannot be read.

      • getLockInformations

        public static ILockInfo getLockInformations(ProjectDescriptor desc)
                                     throws IOException
        Test whether a project is locked.
        Parameters:
        desc - a project descriptor.
        Returns:
        lock informations if the project is locked, else null.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of I/O failure
